content.rendered:
Trade the market your way

Choose the trading account that’s right for you

Trading Account
for the heavy trader
  • $1000 Minimum Deposit
  • Spread from 0 pips on Majors
  • 1:1000 Max Leverage*
  • $8 commission round turn
  • 0.01 minimum trade volume
  • 50 Lot restriction per ticket (FX)
  • Hedging allowed
  • Islamic / SWAP Free NOT available
  • Negative Balance Protection
  • Personal Account Manager
  • NO training provided
  • Stop out at 20%
  • Margin call at 100%
View Product Outline
Trading Account
for the support oriented trader
  • $50 Minimum Deposit
  • Spread from 1.0 pips on Majors
  • 1:1000 Max Leverage*
  • NO commission
  • 0.01 minimum trade volume
  • 50 Lot restriction per ticket (FX)
  • Hedging allowed
  • Islamic / SWAP Free allowed
  • Negative Balance Protection
  • Personal Account Manager
  • Training provided
  • Stop out at 20%
  • Margin call at 100%
View Product Outline

*Please note max leverage is 1:400 for clients under Windsor Markets (Kenya) Limited.

*Please note max leverage is 1:500 for for clients under Seldon Investments Limited (Jordan).

Let’s get started

Open AccountTry Demo
